content: In the laundry room on the first floor you have access to 2 washing machines (numbered machine 1 and 2), 2 tumble dryers (numbered tumble dryer 1 and 2), and 2 vacuum cleaner
To access the washing machines, tumble dryers and hoovers, you must first register on the schedules available online here (nicob.ovh/plannings)
An android application is also available from this link
!!! Please empty the water tanks of the tumble dryers after use !
You can throw the water into the sink in the laundry room (behind the dryers)
If you have any problems please do not hesitate to send a message to Nicolas who is the laundry manager !
The main referrers this year are :
Chakht Hajar, T214, 07.69.90.76.14, Messenger
Margaux Sigler, T310, 07.82.93.24.78, Messenger
The persons referrers for each floor are : (coming soon)
1st floor : Ayoub Sahli, O111, 07.63.23.72.03, Messenger
2nd floor : Anne-Charlotte Boismoreau, O217, 07.81.65.45.92, Messenger
3rd floor : Kenza Piesset, T301, 06.05.38.26.17, Messenger
4th floor : LÃ©a Druault, T419, 07.89.63.30.07, Messenger
5th floor : Lucas Sadoul, O501, 06.51.91.72.49, Messenger
6th floor : Lilou Klein, T612, 06.73.58.68.44, Messenger
The other referrer is :
Laundry and informatic referrer : Nicolas Barrat, T404, 07.81.70.66.63, Messenger
The role of the floor referrers is to link with the main referrers
They are also there to help organise and prepare events in the residence
They are the ones who will report problems on the floor such as smells, noise on the floor, a broken lamp in the corridor etc...
(so no need to call the technical service for a broken lamp in the corridor)
First of all, you can send a message to Nicolas (07.81.70.66.63) so that he can add you to the running conversation of the residence !
You will find on it all the people you could go running with (always better to go running with several people!)
You can find the photos of the inter residence here
The breakfast room is located on the second floor between the O and T buildings and is open between 7am and 9am
You will find everything you need for breakfast (drinks: tea, coffee, hot chocolate, orange juice, apple juice; fresh bread; jam, spreads, butter; cereals)!
Dishes are not provided, so please bring your own!
The 5th floor room contains a TV, table football, darts, chairs and a basketball hoop
It is located on the 5th floor between the T-building and the O
If you want to access it, just send a message to Hajar or to Margaux in order to retrieve the keys
